trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Laredo
There were no other sightings in Laredo on or around April 16th 2013
Summary: Amber orb appeared in the Western sky.
divs: sighting detailsafter hearing of reports of something in the western sky. i scanned the evening sky with my binoculars. while viewing a orange amber light suddenly appeared. the amber orb was circular and bright and about the twice the size of the planet jupiter if viewing through the naked eye. it appeared over mexico or some miles from the rio grande\us mx border. the event lasted for about 10 seconds and then the object disappeared.
